Sincerly,
Your PR Director

Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Tony Eusebio
Dear Sir,
Tony Eusebio is hitting the ball well at AA Frisco Rough Riders!
He has an AVG of .358, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Pete Schourek
Dear Sir,

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
